channel.title: HELP! please
channel.description: Well i was just on a site that said i had to edit my path in "my computer properties" and i edited to what it said and now everytime i Click "run server" on my server it does a quick flash and then exits out help please..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 07:36:06 PM[/size][hr]can anyone open they "computer properties" and paste the veriable value thing here?? .. i need please[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 07:42:09 PM[/size][hr]!!!

item.title: HELP! please
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

which java do you have?
replace it with this, same happens to mine but this helps

@echo off title Java Compiler and Runner "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe" server pause

go to runserver, right click edit, delete it all and paste that in, compile then run

Read full topic
